name: Domestic violence community centre receives funding
description: Knight Inlet or Tsawatti or Tswawadwi is one of the principal inlets of the British Columbia Coast, and the largest of the major inlets in the southern part of the Coast. It is fifth in sequence of the great saltwater inlets north from the 49th parallel near Vancouver, but it is the first whose outflow points away from the Strait of Georgia, opening into Queen Charlotte Strait at the Kwakwaka ºwakw community of Memkumlis (often known by the name of the group who were based there, the Mamalilikala) on Village Island.
